name: latenciestoIV.csv
title: Behavioral and biochemical effects of ethanol withdrawal in zebrafish
description: Dataset from accompanying paper on the effects of ethanol withdrawal on zebrafish behavior in the light/dark test, pilocarpine-induced seizure, and catalase activity in brain and head kidney

licenses.name: ODC-PDDL-1.0
licenses.title: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License v1.0

fields.description: Group variable; strings represent control group ('CTRL') or EtOH withdrawal group ('WD')
fields.name: Gr

fields.description: Whether or not a seizure event took place
fields.name: seizure
